text: Upright Magic () is a 1975 Soviet comedy-fantasy movie directed by Yuri PobedonostsevФильмы о мамах. В честь Дня матери в «Москино» бесплатно покажут киноЧЕСТНОЕ ВОЛШЕБНОЕ and stars I. Fominskaya, Yuri Minin, and Elena Sanaeva. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1975 comedy movies Category:1975 fantasy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies
title: Upright Magic
